title: India soaks in colours of Holi
text:
India soaks in colours of Holi Friday, March 02, 2018 - 00:48 
Indians are celebrating Holi, the Hindu festival of colours, this week, spraying water cannon and smearing coloured powders over each other in an annual ritual marking the beginning of spring. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
